title: Auditing - Review Network Documentation
description: As part of a network audit project, an engineer reviews the client's existing documentation for accuracy and completeness.

tasks.description: Gather all existing network diagrams, IP schemas, and device configurations from the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer has all the client's current documentation.

tasks.description: Compare the documentation against the actual live configuration of the network by logging into devices.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer identifies multiple discrepancies, such as undocumented firewall rules and incorrect VLAN assignments.

tasks.description: Create a report detailing the documentation gaps and inaccuracies as a key finding of the audit.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal report is created, recommending a project to update all network documentation.
